#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
long long int cal(long long int a,long long int b,char op)
{
	switch(op)
	{
		case '/':
			return floor(double(a)/b);
		case '*':
			return a*b;
		case '+':
			return a+b;
		case '-':
			return a-b;
	}
}
int main()
{
	char *op,c[5] = {'/','*','+','-'};
	long long int t,*arr,i,j,start,n;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		arr = new long long int[n];
		op = new char[n-1];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin >> arr[i];
		start = 0;
		for(i=0;i<n-1;)
		{

			for(j=start;j<start+4;j++)
			{
				op[i++] = c[j%4];
			}
			start++;
			start = start%4;
		}
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			arr[i] = cal(arr[i-1],arr[i],op[i-1]);
		}
		cout << arr[i-1] << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
